hotels.title: Riverview Hotel
hotels.address: Nehru Bridge Corner Near Sakar Vii , Opp Patang Hotel, Ahmedabad 380009 India
about: Riverview Hotel is a good choice for travellers looking for a 3 star hotel in Ahmedabad. It is located in Near Nehru Bridge.
From all the 3 Star hotels in Ahmedabad, Riverview Hotel is very much popular among the tourists across the whole India.
A smooth check-in/check-out process, flexible policies and friendly management garner great customer satisfaction for all.
82% of the guests have recommended Riverview Hotel on our platform. Good service quality, nice location, good rooms, good.
hotels.description: Located in Ahmedabad’s downtown commercial area of Nehru Bridge, Ashram Road, on the banks of River Sabarmati, Always Hotel Riverview is a modern & contemporary 3 Star Hotel in the country’s fastest growing city. Well appointed, spacious rooms with parquet flooring & all modern amenities, it is ideal for both business & leisure traveler.Plan your next luxury stay at the Riverview Hotel is one of the best hotel in Ahmedabad near sabarmati riverfront, which is the perfect destination for budget stay in Ahmedabad. Riverview hotel is located near Ashram Road Ahmedabad

feedback.name: Alex Adams
feedback.desc1: I visited the hotel with my family and loved it. The hotel is clean and the staff is courteous.  I especially liked their in house restaurant eatery and had an amazing experience there.
feedback.desc2: The food over here is splendid, We had great experience with the staff , manager Manoj and executive manager pawan and anima . Overall it was a great experience.

feedback.name: Jignesh Patel
feedback.desc1: I visited the hotel with my family and loved it. The hotel is clean and the staff is courteous.  I especially liked their in house restaurant eatery and had an amazing experience there.

hotels.title: Courtyard By Marriott
hotels.address: Ramdev Nagar Cross Road Satellite Road, Ahmedabad 380015 India
hotels.description: Courtyard by Marriott, Ahmedabad is ideally located in Gujarat, Ahmedabad, India's commercial capital with easy access to the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International airport as well as SG Highway, one of the city's fastest growing business districts. Our Ahmedabad luxury hotel is also close to all major business parks, Gujarat's largest shopping mall, world-class cinemas, the Gandhi Ashram and Shaking Minarets. We offer 164 spacious contemporary guest rooms including 6 Deluxe and 6 Executive suites, complete with in-room laptop size safes, LCD panels, iHome docking station, Wi-Fi Internet and workstations that support all your business needs. Facilities include an Executive Lounge, 24-hour fitness centre, swimming pool, Ode Spa and state-of-the-art meeting and banquet spaces. We offer 3 restaurants - MoMo Cafe, Bayleaf and Java+ each special in a versatile cuisine.

hotels.title: Taj Skyline
hotels.address: Sindhubhavan Road, Shilaj Sankalp Square III, Opp. Saket3, Nr. Nilkanth Green, Ahmedabad 380059 India
hotels.description: Taj Skyline at Ahmedabad is a vantage, 5 star luxury hotel with 170 rooms with 18 Floors of view. The hotel is easily accessible to the business districts of S.G. Highway, Sanand & Gandhinagar. An all day dining outlet, a speciality pan Asian restaurant and a tea-lounge for delectable cuisines. Luxurious banqueting, conferencing spaces and Taj's signature Jiva Spa is available.

hotels.title: Four Points by Sheraton
hotels.address: Opposite Gujarat College Ellis Bridge, Ahmedabad 380006 India
hotels.description: Get what you’re looking for with the style and service you want, all at a great price. We have what matters most to you, like a comfortable bed, a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee. You will also find high speed internet access, and delicious, simple food. Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad has a great location in the heart of the city. We are just 10km from Ahmedabad airport, 3km from the railway station and 1.5km from Paldi bus station. Shopping is just minutes away from our door. Our well-equipped meeting rooms and pre-function area totals 288 square meters. Let our team of dedicated professionals work with you to host your special event. Whether you are in town for business or leisure, convenience, comfort and value are everywhere at Four Points by Sheraton Ahmedabad.

highlights: Get a chance to swim along the majestic marine creatures including the Torpedo Rays and the Yellowtail Barracuda
Explore the Persian Gulf and their colorful coral reefs as you dive deep into the amazing underwater world of Dubai
Get hassle free hotel pick up & drop off as you experience scuba diving in Dubai Beach best view!
With training given by PADI certified divers before your scuba experience, this activity is safe for all level of divers

adventures.title: Viking Cave
highlights: Explore this naturally formed cave located at the bottom of a tall limestone cliff on the northeastern side of Ko Phi Phi island.
Check out the paintings on the eastern and southern walls of the cave that are believed to be done by pirates who took shelter at the caves.
Spot the swiftlet birds' nests in the Viking Caves which are actually edible and harvested by locals to be used in exotic Chinese delicacies.
